ratings.comment: Juan had so much passion for both the students and for the material which he was teaching. His excitement and class involvement helped me to really grasp the material.
He was a great teacher that made class interesting. A really nice good guy.
He's a great teacher, and makes discussion engaging and interesting. Would definitely take again.
Juan is literally the only reason I passed this class.

Juan made the confusing material from lecture very clear in discussion. He is the reason I knew what was going on in the class. He is extremely enthusiastic, adorable, and very easy to understand! I wish I could have had him more than just once a week.
Juan is wonderful. He's very energetic and passionate about what he teaches, and manages to get the students taking 223 just for the pre-req (i.e. me) interested.

TA for my 9:50 Friday morning this semester, Juan is literally the only reason I ever showed up. He's hilarious and really tried to make the material interesting and fun, as well as sent out weekly emails to us clarifying any difficult concepts. Will make an incredible professor when he gets his doctorate.

Juan is really great! He has so much ENERGY about whatever it is he is teaching--- it is so fun to be in class with him! I learned 10x more from Juan in once a week discussion than I did in the twice a week lectures. Take a class with him as your TA if you can!!!

JUAN IS THE BEST!!! I learned a lot from him and even though some of the tests were challenging he made the class super fun and interesting! He's really good at clarifying things if you don't understand and it was kind of fun to teach him some english stuff too hahah will definitely miss this class!

He's not the greatest TA in the world, but his willingness to help is great and he does not grade too harshly either, which helps.  It is not difficult to earn a BC, B or AB in this class if you put the work into it, but may be hard to get an A given the difficulty of the material.  Overall, good TA.  Plus, he's hilarious!

This is the second class I've taken with Juan. He is the best TA I've ever had. Hilarious, incredibly helpful during office hours, and an overall joy to be around. Class is never boring. Highly recommend.

Highly recommend taking a class (or more) with Juan! I had him for SPAN204 freshman year & 224 sophomore year. Great teacher who knows everything & makes learning fun. Posts all slides online for easy access when studying for tests. Clearly articulates what you need to study & explains everything in great depth. Probably my favorite teacher at UW.

Juan's energy is contagious, his passion is evident and he has a seemingly omniscient understanding of the content. He's created a class atmosphere I genuinely look forward to attending, and where participation is actually enjoyable. He's sparked my curiosity in Spanish literature, namely Argentinian, & consequently I now plan to study abroad there

Juan is an AWESOME ta. Ive had him for both 204 and 224 and he's been great in both. He makes the subject matter interesting regardless of what it is and the work load is never daunting. hes a very fair grader and definitely willing to help/answer any questions. i HIGHLY recommend taking a class with him if you can!
Juan makes Spanish really fun! He's always enthusiastic and tries to keep everyone engaged.

Most fun TA I have ever had! Juan makes a dry subject fun, and has a great personality. Makes sure his students learn the material well, not just memorizing it. A great way to finish out my Spanish career. Easy to get an A if you commit to studying for the class, because of the way he teaches.

Juan is such a good TA! always very helpful and very approachable. He speaks a little quickly, but he it is still easy to understand. makes the class very interesting and its not a chore to go to 4 days a week. Not a heavy workload, he makes it pretty easy to get an A or B. I HIGHLY recommend getting him if you can!

Most entertaining teacher I have ever had. He explains the concepts of each chapter clearly and knows what he is teaching. Often tells funny stories and makes up scenarios in order to use the concepts of the current chapter. Overall, best teacher I have had, plus he is extremely helpful and approachable.
